author: Samantha Sharf
title: 7 Ways Recent Grads Should Spend Their Money - In Photos: 7 Ways Recent Grads Should Spend Their Money - Forbes
text:
7 Ways Recent Grads Should Spend Their Money
The labor market in the best shape in years. Meaning 2015 grads have less reason to worry that their slightly older peers and may therefore be more willing to spend. But they need to be smart about it.
Photo: 2009 Getty Images
